article_title: $2M budget shortfall for Community Mental Health means staff, program cuts

article_metadata.description: About 80 staff, stakeholders, patients and their families gathered Monday evening to learn more about a $2 million budget hole facing Ottawa County’s Community Mental Health.
article_metadata.author: Amy.Biolchini @hollandsentinel.com (616) 546-4219

og.description: About 80 staff, stakeholders, patients and their families gathered Monday evening to learn more about a $2 million budget hole facing Ottawa
